title: How to Play Guitar Hero 2 Using the Regular Controller

steps.headline: Press the correct button at the time the notes come.
steps.description: Instead of pressing the frets and pushing the strum bar, you just press the appropriate button for the note.

steps.headline: Note that the keys are:
steps.description: Green: L2 Red: L1 Yellow: R1 Blue: R2 Orange: X/A Up/Down: Directional Keys Select: X/A Star Power: Select Start: Start Whammy: Left Analog Stick up.

text: Press the correct button at the time the notes come. Instead of pressing the frets and pushing the strum bar, you just press the appropriate button for the note. Note that the keys are: Green: L2 Red: L1 Yellow: R1 Blue: R2 Orange: X/A Up/Down: Directional Keys Select: X/A Star Power: Select Start: Start Whammy: Left Analog Stick up.
sentences: Press the correct button at the time the notes come.
Instead of pressing the frets and pushing the strum bar, you just press the appropriate button for the note.
Note that the keys are: Green: L2 Red: L1 Yellow: R1 Blue: R2 Orange: X/A Up/Down: Directional Keys Select: X/A Star Power: Select Start: Start Whammy: Left Analog Stick up.
